snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry and other officials are using Twitter to augment, and even replace, the carefully scripted and vetted language of official statements.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; Secretary of State John Kerry and other diplomatic officials are using Twitter to augment, and even replace, carefully scripted and vetted language of official State Department and White House statements.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry and other officials are using Twitter to augment, and even replace, the carefully scripted and vetted language of official statements.

headline.main: In the Scripted World of Diplomacy, a Burst of Tweets
